Title: 39066 - IG Intro- Net Credit- 39066
Direction: 250 words- This assignment is for an introduction to an infographic. In the link provided you will find the IG for reference and a pre-written intro for this IG. Your directions are to make that pre-written introduction into a 250 word unique intro for the IG that also fits the tone of the desired domain. You can use what is already written as a reference to write your own.
